title: Ticket #121: startd should advertise number of child processes a job has
description:
The startd tracks the child processes anyway, so including the total number of processes a given job has in the machine ad would be helpful. The information could give admins a useful view of how users use the pool. It could also be used in policy expressions, say to kill rogue jobs that occasionally go haywire and accidentally forkbomb the machine.

(Imported from 1707 (backup) 1707 (public))
